summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6672 for the improvement of W. Highland Drive from Olympic Way W. to 8th Place W.; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system in accordance with the provisions of Chapter 144, Laws of 1957; and Chapter 119, Laws of 1967; under Ordinance No. 105546, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
